====================
gaitanalysis Package
====================

The following documentation provides both the pubic and private API for the
modules included in the gaitanalysis package. We will try our best to follow
`semantic versioning <http://semver.org/>`_ with respect to the public API. The
private member functions, starts with ``_``, are subject to change during
development and will not be held to semantic versioning. Use at your own risk.

:mod:`motek` Module
-------------------

    :members:
    :private-members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
